title: S16 Ep75: Supernatural News/Parashare: Textorcisms Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Textorcisms Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/ParaShare Textorcisms Edition

Dave & Tim are joined by 2 guests, Gare Allen and Aaron Sagers plus we take a look at the strange, supernatural news from around the world. It is a week with a Ghost Train sighting, America's Got Talent judge Sophia Vergara is spooked by a psychic moment on air, Demonic Texting, Weird Military Paranormal stories, Headless Horsemen PLUS your emails and stories AND a Theater of the Mind!

Check out Ripley's Road Trip series with Aaron Sagers here: https://bit.ly/3ACjZvd

Get Ghost Crimes 2 book here: https://amzn.to/2UrK1kc
